title.rendered: Where to Stream National Finals Rodeo LIVE from anywhere

content.rendered:
The National Finals Rodeo (NFR) is the premier rodeo event in the world. It is the culmination of the Professional Rodeo Cowboys Association (PRCA) season, where the top 15 contestants in each of the seven rodeo events compete for the coveted gold buckle and a share of a multi-million dollar purse.

  • Date: December 7 – 16, 2023
  • Location: Thomas & Mack Center, Las Vegas, Nevada
  • Events: Bareback Riding, Steer Wrestling, Team Roping, Saddle Bronc Riding, Tie-Down Roping, Barrel Racing, Bull Riding
  • Performances: Ten nightly performances beginning at 6:45 PM PST

The National Finals Rodeo (NFR) is a spectacle not to be missed, and even if you’re miles away, you can still experience its thrilling energy. With Round 2 currently unfolding on this Friday, December 8th, 2023, let’s explore your options for live and extended engagement:

VPN-enabled Streaming Services

  • The Cowboy Channel Plus: The official streaming service of The Cowboy Channel, holding exclusive NFR broadcasting rights in the US, offers international access via a VPN. Subscribe for $19.99 monthly or $179.99 annually.
  • Sling TV: By subscribing to the Heartland Extra add-on for $5 per month, international viewers with a VPN can access The Cowboy Channel and watch the NFR live.
  • DirecTV Now: Choose the Ultimate or Premier package, each including The Cowboy Channel, for $115 and $160 monthly respectively. Utilize a VPN for international access.
  • RFD-TV: Offering NFR broadcasts and a streaming service for $9.99 per month, RFD-TV requires a VPN for international access.

Additional International Options

  • Local TV Channels: Some international channels may broadcast the NFR. Research local listings for availability.
  • PRCA Website: The PRCA website occasionally offers free live streams of the NFR, accessible internationally.

VPN Recommendation

ExpressVPN is a popular choice for reliable and secure VPN connections, enabling international viewers to bypass geographical restrictions and access US streaming services for the NFR.

Remember, while specific streaming services and channels may require subscriptions or VPNs, there are numerous ways to experience the thrill of the NFR even if you’re not physically present. So, saddle up, grab your virtual hat, and join the rodeo spirit from anywhere in the world!
